code: import React,{Component}from"react";import{Doughnut}from"react-chartjs-2";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import"./PullRequestChart.css";import PullRequestData from"../../shared/opensource/pull_requests.json";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class PullRequestChart extends Component{render(){const data={labels:["Open","Merged","Closed"],datasets:[{data:[PullRequestData["open"],PullRequestData["merged"],PullRequestData["closed"]],backgroundColor:["#28a745","#6f42c1","#d73a49"],hoverBackgroundColor:["#28a745dd","#6f42c1dd","#d73a49dd"]}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pr-chart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:2000,distance:"20px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"pr-chart-header",children:"Pull Request Distribution"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Doughnut,{data:data,options:{padding:"0",margin:"0",responsive:true,maintainAspectRatio:true,animation:{duration:4000}}})]});}}export default PullRequestChart;
